/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene scene of a street in Beijing, China. The street, lined with lush green trees and bushes, stretches out into the distance, disappearing into the horizon. A stone wall runs along the right side of the street, adding a rustic charm to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a beautiful contrast to the greenery below. In the distance, mountains rise majestically, their peaks touching the sky. The image is taken from a high vantage point, offering a panoramic view of the street and its surroundings. The perspective gives a sense of depth and scale, highlighting the vastness of the landscape. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees and bushes standing out against the blue of the sky and the gray of the stone wall. The image provides a glimpse into the tranquil beauty of Beijing, a city where nature and urban life coexist harmoniously.
